website_summaries.verdict: The HP Notebook 15 (ba009dx) is a highly affordable desktop-replacement laptop for budget-conscious users with modest computing needs.
The HP 15-ba010nr is your standard budget desktop-replacement laptop: It may not stand out, but it does what it needs to do for a good price.
pros: Comes with one year of free Dropbox storage
cons: Low 1,366-by-768 resolution with overly glossy coating

customer_reviews.title: SLOWEST LAPTOP EVER! DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop around October 2017 and is swear to god i have not touched anything so slow. For the first few days it had problems loading simple apps like Google Chrome. Like you know its a bad laptop when it takes 5-10 minutes to get from powering up the laptop to viewing your page. After few weeks i have to say id did speed up by a small bit to a do-able standard. But i haven't touched it over the summer and now the laptop could take 20+ mins to power up and load facebook. DO NOT BUY! SAVE SMALL BIT MORE AND BUY SOMETHING MORE DECENT!!!! If i could I'd give this laptop less than half of star.
customer_reviews.author: sylwek

customer_reviews.title: Slowest Laptop Ever
customer_reviews.text: I still have this laptop but it has been the slowest ever laptop since the day and minute I bought it. The fan sounds like an airplane taking off - it is obviously not well built or even possibly an old fan put into new casing. The computer drive runs at 100% even with nothing running apart from background programs. It cost me just over £500 three years ago. It's now time for me to upgrade and needless to say I won't buy from Amazon this time. I will go elsewhere local to me where I can get proper warranty/customer care etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience
customer_reviews.text: I have purchaces this laptop as a warehouse deal.... the first warehouse deal.. and for sure ... THE LAST. Overall the laptop is ok and I figure a new one is very good... But the one I bought from the moment I have unpacked it is started making very loud noise... :) Sounds like a coffee grinder or a vacuum cleaner... I am very dissapointed by this purchase. I contacted costumer service (to get a partial refund) but they gave me 2 options: to send it back or to go to a HP service and get a quote for the repair... For both of them it requires time wich I don.t have.
customer_reviews.author: Sorin

customer_reviews.title: The staff were useless. Finally a supervisor advised it could be returned ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived used and not working. The screen was dead with an error message. The staff were useless. Finally a supervisor advised it could be returned and 8 had to shop outside for a good laptop.
customer_reviews.author: C. John

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support 5ghz networks
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't support 5g networks, surprising for a modern laptop. how are you supposed to know by "wireless type BGN" in the stats. not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Martyn

customer_reviews.title: HP Laptop
customer_reviews.text: A great item! It was a present for my son and he was very pleased with it - to date I have had no complaints from him :)
customer_reviews.author: Ian Deverell

customer_reviews.title: Worst Laptop I have every bought
customer_reviews.text: Laptop stopped booting after 5 months of purchase I followed the process to recover the system from the recovery partition however at about 90% complete the system reported that the recovery could not be completed. The system will of course still not boot.
customer_reviews.author: John Harrild

customer_reviews.title: Too many hw faults
customer_reviews.text: The sound stopped working within a year of the purchase, this was repaired as a part of a warranty. Now the fan is faulty, year and a half after purchasing the laptop. Not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: MRS PAVLA SCHOLES

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: After just over a years use, its already been replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K P Haines

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few weeks now. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lynch

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING - NO DVD DRIVE.
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT have the DVD drive as advertised on the selling page. This is FALSE ADVERTISING and I feel anyone who purchases this product are being cheated out of a feature that people thought and believe is included but severely disappointed upon product delivery. . . . Besides that major feature flaw, I do like how this laptop is working for me so far, and hopefully continues to do so in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sian

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, shame about the hard disk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop somewhat hindered by its rather slow hard disk that behaves as a bottleneck to performance. I don't recommend this unless you are comfortable fixing computers or voiding possible warranties but I replaced it with an SSD and its a different machine, in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pacey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As a rather ignorant computer user I find this fairly easy to get to grips with. Someone else set it up for me, but I am comfortable with it now and can do all that I need to do. Looks good, black and sleek. HP recommended to me by someone who knows about these things. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: David Horne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a computer person but this does everything I want it to very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A.

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Worst laptop I have ever bought, I should have sent it straight back but HP support convinced me it could be fixed by re-installing Windows. Constant freezing and occasional random rebooting. It has been back to HP twice the first time they said there was a hard drive fault which they had fixed (but they hadn't). Second time they said there was nothing wrong with it, but the same fault has been present all the time. Utter rubbish!
customer_reviews.author: Liam Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit. Exceptional value for money. I am not a computer geek but I find it very easy to use.A friend is a geek and he was very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: peter tiebel

customer_reviews.title: The laptop wouldn't connect to certain internet pages even after ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop wouldn't connect to certain internet pages even after contacting HP customer support and resetting it! I eventually had to return it!
customer_reviews.author: James Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice and light. Battery lasts for ages and it stays cool.
customer_reviews.author: jenny-lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Quick and light
customer_reviews.text: I like this laptop, it is quick and has a large screen but is not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm - bought this under the impression it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm - bought this under the impression it came with DVD writer - it doesn't. Keyboard very responsive. Actual unit very slow to do anything. Battery lasts quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs E.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is extremely slow and laggy and often looses wifi connection when it has full bars of wifi
customer_reviews.author: JackDorey5225

customer_reviews.title: terrible and wrong laptop
customer_reviews.text: completely different laptop, different processor, colour and ram so disappointed.. rung support and didn't really seem bothered and asked if I wanted to keep it even though it not even close to what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, laptop arrived on time, looks good and works fine. Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Sevilla Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product good price fast delivery, not Lightning fast but not slow ether
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I would like it to be
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I would like it to be. Keyboard is a bit flimsy and normally cannot tell if the power is on. Just need it for the rest of this year so it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new laptop. I am satisfied with it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 2 month ago and the speed is really down , sometimes i need to restart it.
customer_reviews.author: ali ghayour

customer_reviews.title: not worked as it should since I have had this ...
customer_reviews.text: not worked as it should since I have had this item, HP have not been of any help, just wish I had not purchased this item
customer_reviews.author: springer

customer_reviews.title: ... the laptop 2 months just gave up on being useful and quiet
customer_reviews.text: was going okay but then the laptop 2 months just gave up on being useful and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Morse

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering if I could make the changeover from desktop to laptop as I am not all that experienced with computers. It was SO easy and it's all up and running perfectly including getting it hooked up to my old printer.
customer_reviews.author: fairreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Steam driven
customer_reviews.text: Everything agonisingly slow, 3 or 4 mins to open a single email with a few lines of text in it slow - at least that's my experience so far as it seems everything enormously time consuming and frustrating to use the first time as it runs set ups presumably. My advice would be to avoid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I see a LOT of negative reviews for this laptop but I disagree entirely. I have had mine for a few months now and it is perfect for the price. I have used it for at least 4 hours per day, sometimes 16 on long days when I am away from home and I have had ZERO issues. If you look after this laptop, and don't expect it to be a supercomputer you will be happy. My only issue is that there is no mic input, so unless you have a usb headset you have to rely on the inbuilt mic.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast processor although power supply gets hot. Does anyone else have that problem?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's fast for a i5 standard. The screen is great! The only con of this laptop is it's HDMI pot as it stops working after I used it only about 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Snowball

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time trying to fond a cheap laptop with a medium/good specification. This HP was about £200 cheaper than the next laptop with a similar spec of processor speed, RAM, graphics, etc. If there was one criticism, it would be that the outer plastics feels a bit cheap. Pleased with my purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: JustSumGuy

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointed when checked the packaging before opening that it did ...
customer_reviews.text: From reading the reviews, had thought it was coming with CD/DVD drive, slightly disappointed when checked the packaging before opening that it did not. But for the price paid, and the amount of times I would actually use it, it is an okay compromise. Only been using it really for Web Browsing, and the odd Word Document on an older version of Office (2007), both of which it handles fine. Set up was also quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the laptop, for the price it is excellent. Only issue I had was the courier losing the first one I ordered, however amazon were first rate and replaced it straight away with no quibbles. Laptop runs most standard tasks quickly and it works straight out of the box which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was returned. It did.not suite my purpose.I have since had my money refunded
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: very slow response
customer_reviews.text: For a laptop with the capacity if this one it is very, very slow indeed. Click on anything and there's a wait of 15 to 20 seconds before anything happens which is a long time in computing terms. Also, no matter how often I resize the screen it still opens at half screen. I suspect that this particular one is actually faulty so might not be a fair judgement.
customer_reviews.author: kevomorego

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Spec looked decent but its really not. I need to update drivers to play a game but couldnt do it with updater so took to an IT shop as scared to do it myself. After completion the reputable technician enquired how long Id had it and commented pn how slow it was considering its condition. Noticed reviews and abilities seem to fluctuate between reviews so not convinced the same product is always shipped out.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Samantha Bray

customer_reviews.title: Update. 29\01\18.Horribly slow. Windows 10 is a pain in the a#s
customer_reviews.text: Update. Had to return this laptop as it was taking 2 hours to boot, and was on updating screen for a week. Returned and purchased lenovo yoga tablet for lesser price and with double the speed. Don't buyVery slow sluggish and driving me nuts even for simplest tasks
customer_reviews.author: emilgeorge4321

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like windows 10 it takes a lot of getting used
customer_reviews.text: A bit slow, I don’t like windows 10 it takes a lot of getting used too
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McInnes

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the lack of speed in which this laptop works. Very slow at everything it does and this has nothing to do with network/WiFi as we have superfast Internet and no other laptop/ipad/iPhone or Android have problems. I should have sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Scam - not a new machine
customer_reviews.text: SCAM- not a new machine, came with no paperwork, a dirty keyboard (food!) And 3rd party software loaded. To make me it worse the windows 10 install was corrupted. Should be a matter for trading standards. Was bought for son's birthday so very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: mark l.

customer_reviews.title: Don't be mislead like I was
customer_reviews.text: To be fair I never got as far as turning it on ! The product is pictured as having a DVD drive on the left hand side and also answered at stating it can play CD's - it hasn't and it can't ! Don't be mislead like I was, there is no DVD drive, very annoying !
customer_reviews.author: Gen MacCallum

customer_reviews.title: Frustratingly slow from new!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful laptop, it was slower than any laptop I've used before, even before my older ones have died on me they were faster. Clicking between different apps woukd take 10-20 seconds to respond and using the Internet was like being back on dial up. Sent back and have been refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys Thomas Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Second time lucky!
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery but it turned out to be faulty. Amazon responded quickly and I received a replacement the next day. This one is fine. It picked up my high speed broadband straight away. I installed win10 pro and all is now working well. Just loading my photos from a memory stick. Has linked to my Samsung account and downloaded from my iPad. Hoping to use this as a replacement for my aging PC! I may set up a backup to an external disk.
customer_reviews.author: Brian 101

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bright this a month ago and screen lid loose and now got lines on it and cant use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop! Arrived quickly and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop! Arrived quickly and works perfectly! Works straight out of the box and easy to connect to home wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. E. Childs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have a CD/DVD drive
customer_reviews.text: The computer in itself is probably very good. I didn't like it because it had no CD/DVD player which isn't readily apparent and it certainly does appear to have one on the accompanying video which I made a point of looking at and indeed opted for it in the first place. I ended up purchasing another laptop (from a different manufacturer) from Amazon which does definitely have a CD/DVD player on it and so I am happy with it. This HP one, I switched it on but I never used it so I can't really rate its performance. I'm sure its very good and it does look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Davie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow (Celeron)
customer_reviews.text: I chose the cheapest version (Intel Celeron). It seems very slow, maybe that's what you get for small amount of money!
customer_reviews.author: Rexmos

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: thought it might be faster but just as slow as my old HP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DVD drive faulty upon startup
customer_reviews.text: Within a minute of starting up the machine the DVD drive popped out of its own accord. Thinking nothing of it I persisted with the startup process and pushed the drive back in. Soon after it popped out again so I inspected the issue. The button release was forced inwards meaning the drive was constantly trying to eject. The package it arrived in was undamaged so I don't blame amazon for any damage. Indeed the DVD drive was cheaply made and constructed and thus i believe this to be a manufacturing error. As a whole the laptop was akin to the DVD drive in its cheap plasticy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Tossranton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to but windows is frustrating compared to a Mac
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ellison

customer_reviews.title: ... as promised got the AMD version and it absolutely fine in every way great screen resolution and good
customer_reviews.text: arrived next day as promised got the AMD version and it absolutely fine in every way great screen resolution and good performance
customer_reviews.author: drragon

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good performance.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how this copes with games considering it has only Intel 620 graphics, runs Wargaming titles, Total War, Civ V on medium/low settings. Fast i7 processor and DDR4 ram compensate very well. Was a little concerned about it not having an SSD for storage but it is good to have 1TB space and everything loads quickly enough. Another compromise compared to more expensive machines is the display resolution but I'm pleased with what I see so far. Windows 10 did not require much updating so must be a recent version. Multi-tasking performance is very good. Wireless is very good and has Ethernet port. I haven't found a use for the DVD drive yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply not good enough. HP should be ashamed sending out computers ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely computer but within a week it was frozen by a scam which told me that there was a microsoft problem. It has cost me £60 to get it unfrozen. It was a piece of code tacked on to a normal programme. McAfee did not pick it up. Simply not good enough. HP should be ashamed sending out computers that can 'die' within a week.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Great cheaper option!
customer_reviews.text: Great cheaper laptop option!!! Always check the specs before purchasing and make sure it fits your needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: HP 15-ba100na Laptop (15.6 inch, AMD A9-9410, 8 GB RAM, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10) - Turbo Silver
product_meta.description:
Tackle all your daily tasks with an affordable laptop that comes packed with all the features you need. Get all the power you want with confidence in a trusted name like HP.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x HP Notebook 15-ba100na
feature_bullets: With the enhanced AMD processors and plenty of hard drive space, you can work, play, multitask and store more of what matters to you; get reliable power and storage you can trust
The crisp HD screen lets you enjoy your photos, videos and web pages in detail
Life can be unpredictable, but your HP laptop shouldn’t be; so whether it’s last minute projects or spontaneous movie nights, enjoy performance backed by over 200 tests

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars105 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
